Row.Text: A Kasbah can only be built on a Desert tile. It provides one additional [ICON_FOOD] Food, [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and [ICON_GOLD] Gold. It also provides the same +50% defense bonus as a Fort. After the Fertilizer technology is researched it provides extra [ICON_FOOD] Food, After the Industrialization technology is researched it provides extra [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and after the Flight technology is researched it provides extra [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Must be built in Moroccan territory.
